cause.description:
1. Gang up (First petition at 100 000 members) 2. Petition the govt 3. Get Stoned.
For those who are sick of hiding their weed, join SA Stoners, donate a little something for our cause.
With enough support I WILL fight the law.
1. Stop Arresting Stoners
2. Stop Burning peoples crops
3. Start fighting real crime
cause.mission: Get Stoned and Not Arrested. Legalize Marijuana in SA by democratic means, ie we TELL the Govt to Decrimilize Smoking Weed
cause.name: SA Stoners Fund
